Lichstein	Jeremy	642	USA-China Biodiversity (USA samples)	Asimina angustifolia	5518	Asimina angustifolia	6234308	60839408			8741	Plant light exposure, plant dominance	CRLIGHT	unknown											unpub.	Light exposure at top of plant crown. Sun = full sunlight for all or most of the day; gap = canopy opening above or on side of plant that provides full sunlight for part of the day; shade = no significant gaps in the canopy that would expose the plant to full sunlight for a significant part of the day; unknown = light level not recorded for this plant.		
Lichstein	Jeremy	642	USA-China Biodiversity (USA samples)	Asimina angustifolia	5518	Asimina angustifolia	6234308	60839409			241	Measurement date / sampling date	DATE_SAMPLE	06/01/2015											unpub.	Date that sample was collected.		
Lichstein	Jeremy	642	USA-China Biodiversity (USA samples)	Asimina angustifolia	5518	Asimina angustifolia	6234308	60839410			443	Canopy position: sun vers. Shade leaf qualifier, light exposure; canopy, understorey,	LFLIGHT	unknown											unpub.	Leaf light level. Same categories as CRLIGHT, but LFLIGHT refers to the light exposure of a leaf sample, whereas CRLIGHT refers to the top of the individual's crown. LFLIGHT can be equal to or more shaded than CRLIGHT. For example, if CRLIGHT = sun, then LFLIGHT can be sun, gap, or shade, depending on a sample's canopy position relative to other leaves and crowns. In contrast, if CRLIGHT = shade, then LFLIGHT can only be shade.		
Lichstein	Jeremy	642	USA-China Biodiversity (USA samples)	Asimina angustifolia	5518	Asimina angustifolia	6234308	60839411			1415	Leaf age at measurement	LFSTATE	green											unpub.	Leaf state: green = mature green leaves, not senescent; red = mature red-colored leaves, not senescent (some Diospyros at OSBS had both green and red leaves, and both were sampled from these individuals); senescent = senescent leaves, still attached to plant, sampled after growing season

Lichstein	Jeremy	642	USA-China Biodiversity (USA samples)	Asimina parviflora	5519	Asimina parviflora	6234374	60840398			8741	Plant light exposure, plant dominance	CRLIGHT	unknown											unpub.	Light exposure at top of plant crown. Sun = full sunlight for all or most of the day; gap = canopy opening above or on side of plant that provides full sunlight for part of the day; shade = no significant gaps in the canopy that would expose the plant to full sunlight for a significant part of the day; unknown = light level not recorded for this plant.		
Lichstein	Jeremy	642	USA-China Biodiversity (USA samples)	Asimina parviflora	5519	Asimina parviflora	6234374	60840399			241	Measurement date / sampling date	DATE_SAMPLE	07/01/2015											unpub.	Date that sample was collected.		
Lichstein	Jeremy	642	USA-China Biodiversity (USA samples)	Asimina parviflora	5519	Asimina parviflora	6234374	60840400			443	Canopy position: sun vers. Shade leaf qualifier, light exposure; canopy, understorey,	LFLIGHT	unknown											unpub.	Leaf light level. Same categories as CRLIGHT, but LFLIGHT refers to the light exposure of a leaf sample, whereas CRLIGHT refers to the top of the individual's crown. LFLIGHT can be equal to or more shaded than CRLIGHT. For example, if CRLIGHT = sun, then LFLIGHT can be sun, gap, or shade, depending on a sample's canopy position relative to other leaves and crowns. In contrast, if CRLIGHT = shade, then LFLIGHT can only be shade.		
Lichstein	Jeremy	642	USA-China Biodiversity (USA samples)	Asimina parviflora	5519	Asimina parviflora	6234374	60840401			1415	Leaf age at measurement	LFSTATE	green											unpub.	Leaf state: green = mature green leaves, not senescent; red = mature red-colored leaves, not senescent (some Diospyros at OSBS had both green and red leaves, and both were sampled from these individuals); senescent = senescent leaves, still attached to plant, sampled after growing season
